Package org.odpi.openmetadata.adapters.connectors.surveyaction.fileclassifier

Class FileClassifier

java.lang.Object
org.odpi.openmetadata.adapters.connectors.surveyaction.fileclassifier.FileClassifier
public class FileClassifier extends Object
Manages different types of classifications for a single file.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileClassifier

      public FileClassifier(SurveyOpenMetadataStore openMetadataStore, File file) throws InvalidParameterException, PropertyServerException, UserNotAuthorizedException
      Use the valid values to classify the file.
      Parameters:
      openMetadataStore - open metadata where the valid values are stored.
      file - file to analyse
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - invalid parameter
      PropertyServerException - problem connecting to the open metadata repositories
      UserNotAuthorizedException - insufficient access

  • Method Details

    • getFileExtension

      public static String getFileExtension(String pathName)
      Retrieves the extension from a path name. For example, if the pathname is "one/two/three.txt", the method returns "txt". If the path name has multiple extensions, such as "my-jar.jar.gz", the final extension is returned (ie "gz"). Null is returned if there is no file extension in the path name.
      Parameters:
      pathName - path name of file or directory
      Returns:
      file extension

    • getFileExtension

      public String getFileExtension()
      Return the file extension of the file.
      Returns:
      letters after the "dot"
